mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_list (num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, regdate) VALUES(file_list_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, regdate FROM file_list ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM file_list ORDER BY num DESC ) WHERE num=#{num}
